Medium: Periodical with five woodcuts; cover by Karl Jacob Hirsch, additional prints by Jan Wroniecki, Christian Schad, Erich Goldbaum, and Julius Kaufmann, and one linoleum cut by Wilhelm Schuler
Artist: Karl Jacob Hirsch, Wilhelm Schuler, Jan Wroniecki, Christian Schad, Erich Goldbaum, Julius Kaufmann
